name: Vehicle Mine
Lore: 'Launches and detonates when activated by a passing metallic mass or the repulsorlift field of an approaching speeder. The shrapnel can hit even the quickest craft.',
Text: 'Deploy at same exterior site as your mining droid. ''Explodes'' if starfighter (use 5 as defense value) or non-creature vehicle deploys or moves to or across same site. Draw destiny. Target lost if destiny +2 > defense value. Vehicle Mine is also lost.',
